item.description:
Trivia Tuesdays - if this is popular we can meet on a regular basis. Our first get together will be October 5, 2010... This will be a joint meet up with SE Mass 20's and 30's couples. Lets meet up and test our knowledge, have fun, laugh, and enjoy.... If you are ordering dinner or drinks please be sure you have enough $$$ for your order and a tip.

Lets meet around 7:30pm. I originally thought Trivia started at 7pm but I'm now told it starts a bit later. JUST FOUND OUT IT STARTS AT 8:30PM. A few of us should be early to be sure we have seats together. We can grab some food then too.

The Half Door in Quincy Center is your typical Irish Pub. They serve food basic pub food an assortment of alcoholic and non alcoholic beverages.

The Half Door is located at 1516 Hancock street Quincy, MA very close to the Quincy Center T and has plenty of parking in the City of Quincy parking lot.

Hope to meet you there!!

http://www.halfdoorpu...][/url]
item.name: Stump Trivia - Half Door Pub Quincy
